buffalo3d.core

Class TextureList

  • java.lang.Object
    • buffalo3d.core.TextureList

  • public class TextureList
extends Object
    Manages a list of TextureVo's used by Object3d's. This allows an Object3d to use multiple textures. If more textures are added than what's supported by the hardware running the application, the extra items are ignored by Renderer Uses a subset of ArrayList's methods.

      Adds texture as the sole item in the list, replacing any existing items

      Get item from the list which is at the given index position

      Returns a String Array of the textureIds of each of the items in the list
